subject: College Athletics
Crime and Criminals
Football
lead_paragraph: The dismissal of Rhett Bomar and J. D. Quinn came after an investigation found that they violated N.C.A.A. rules by receiving extra compensation from jobs at a private business.
snippet: The dismissal of Rhett Bomar and J. D. Quinn came after an investigation found that they violated N.C.A.A. rules by receiving extra compensation from jobs at a private business.
